comments.raw_text:
User-Agent:       Mozilla/5.0 (Macintosh; U; Intel Mac OS X 10.6; en-US; rv:1.9.2.13) Gecko/20101203 Firefox/3.6.13
Build Identifier: Mozilla/5.0 (Macintosh; U; Intel Mac OS X 10.6; en-US; rv:1.9.2.13) Gecko/20101203 Firefox/3.6.13

Navigating to the specified URL fails, and redirects to:

http://www.email template.html/?hFileID=3079&hFileAttachment=0&hUserID=8546

Removing the "/Sites" folder from the path corrects this bug.

Reproducible: Always

Date:	Wed, 09 Feb 2011 15:04:40 GMT

Why Do you think that there is a browser bug and not a server one ?
The location header is for example broken (the space is not escaped).
